fields.summary: MobileWeb: New back button mechanisms prevents breakpoints from being set

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use device to access KS build from localhost
2. Click on Slider
3. Click back

Actual:
Goes to previous URL

Expected:
Should go up 1 level in KS
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Android: back button brings user back to the previous browsed link and not up a level in KS
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120305174654
Android: Samsung Galaxy 4.0.2
iOS: iPhone 4 (5.0.1)

comments.body: Back button support simply isn't there to properly solve this problem. Instead, we are implementing iOS style navigation in TIMOB-7981.
